name: Pixel Tank
description:
Pixel Tank is a really simple game.
It's a pixelated fish tank!

Use it to relax or as ambiance in the background of your work day or even while you sleep!
Every minute in game you gain a coin. You can use those coins to unlock any fish you want in the game.

It's like Pixelated ASMR!

Pixel Tank features 24 different fish and creatures you can populate your tank with and no limit of how many of each you can add in.
The possibilities are endless. Will you fill your tank with comfy fish or maybe something more flashy like a rainbow flashing fish?
All in glorious 16 bit graphics to give you that nostalgic feel.
